verses.verse: Y'hudah <S%G2455><s%>, the servant <S%G1401><s%> of Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> of Ya`akov <S%G2385><s%>, to them that are sanctified <S%G37><s%> <S%G5772><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> preserved <S%G5083><s%> <S%G5772><s%> in Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>, and called <S%G2822><s%>:

Beloved <S%G27><s%>, when I gave <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5734><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> diligence <S%G4710><s%> to write <S%G1125><s%> <S%G5721><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> the common <S%G2839><s%> salvation <S%G4991><s%>, it was <S%G2192><s%> needful <S%G318><s%> for me <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5627><s%> to write <S%G1125><s%> <S%G5658><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, and exhort <S%G3870><s%> <S%G5723><s%> you that ye should earnestly contend <S%G1864><s%> <S%G5738><s%> for the faith <S%G4102><s%> which was once <S%G530><s%> delivered <S%G3860><s%> <S%G5685><s%> unto the saints <S%G40><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> there are certain <S%G5100><s%> men <S%G444><s%> crept in unawares <S%G3921><s%> <S%G5656><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> were before <S%G4270><s%> of old <S%G3819><s%> ordained <S%G4270><s%> <S%G5772><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> condemnation <S%G2917><s%>, ungodly men <S%G765><s%>, turning <S%G3346><s%> <S%G5723><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> lasciviousness <S%G766><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> denying <S%G720><s%> <S%G5740><s%> the only <S%G3441><s%> YY <S%G1203><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> YY <S%G2962><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>.

I will <S%G1014><s%> <S%G5736><s%> therefore <S%G1161><s%> put <S%G5279><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> in remembrance <S%G5279><s%> <S%G5658><s%>, though ye <S%G5209><s%> once <S%G530><s%> knew <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5761><s%> this <S%G5124><s%>, how that <S%G3754><s%> the YY <S%G2962><s%>, having saved <S%G4982><s%> <S%G5660><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the land <S%G1093><s%> of Egypt <S%G125><s%>, afterward <S%G1208><s%> destroyed <S%G622><s%> <S%G5656><s%> them that believed <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5660><s%> not <S%G3361><s%>.

Havahn as <S%G5613><s%> Sodom <S%G4670><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Gomorrha <S%G1116><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the cities <S%G4172><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> them <S%G846><s%> in like <S%G3664><s%> <S%G5125><s%> manner <S%G5158><s%>, giving themselves over to fornication <S%G1608><s%> <S%G5660><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> going <S%G565><s%> <S%G5631><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> strange <S%G2087><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%>, are set forth for <S%G4295><s%> <S%G5736><s%> an example <S%G1164><s%>, suffering <S%G5254><s%> <S%G5723><s%> the vengeance <S%G1349><s%> of eternal <S%G166><s%> fire <S%G4442><s%>.

Likewise <S%G3668><s%> <S%G3305><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> filthy dreamers <S%G1797><s%> <S%G5740><s%> defile <S%G3392><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the flesh <S%G3303><s%> <S%G4561><s%>, <S%G1161><s%> despise <S%G114><s%> <S%G5719><s%> dominion <S%G2963><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> speak evil <S%G987><s%> <S%G5719><s%> of dignities <S%G1391><s%>.

Yet <S%G1161><s%> Mikha'el <S%G3413><s%> the archangel <S%G743><s%>, when <S%G3753><s%> contending <S%G1252><s%> <S%G5734><s%> with the devil <S%G1228><s%> he disputed <S%G1256><s%> <S%G5711><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> the body <S%G4983><s%> of Mosheh <S%G3475><s%>, durst <S%G5111><s%> <S%G5656><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> bring against him <S%G2018><s%> <S%G5629><s%> a railing <S%G988><s%> accusation <S%G2920><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, The YY <S%G2962><s%> rebuke <S%G2008><s%> <S%G5659><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> speak evil <S%G987><s%> <S%G5719><s%> of those things which <S%G3745><s%> <S%G3303><s%> they know <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5758><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> what <S%G3745><s%> they know <S%G1987><s%> <S%G5736><s%> naturally <S%G5447><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> brute <S%G249><s%> beasts <S%G2226><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> those things <S%G5125><s%> they corrupt themselves <S%G5351><s%> <S%G5743><s%>.

Woe <S%G3759><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>! for <S%G3754><s%> they have gone <S%G4198><s%> <S%G5675><s%> in the way <S%G3598><s%> of Kayin <S%G2535><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> ran greedily after <S%G1632><s%> <S%G5681><s%> the error <S%G4106><s%> of Balaam <S%G903><s%> for reward <S%G3408><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> perished <S%G622><s%> <S%G5639><s%> in the gainsaying <S%G485><s%> of Core <S%G2879><s%>.

These <S%G3778><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> <S%G5748><s%> spots <S%G4694><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> feasts of charity <S%G26><s%>, when they feast <S%G4910><s%> <S%G5740><s%> with you <S%G5213><s%>, feeding <S%G4165><s%> <S%G5723><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%> without fear <S%G870><s%>: clouds <S%G3507><s%> they are without water <S%G504><s%>, carried about <S%G4064><s%> <S%G5746><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> winds <S%G417><s%>; trees <S%G1186><s%> whose fruit withereth <S%G5352><s%>, without fruit <S%G175><s%>, twice <S%G1364><s%> dead <S%G599><s%> <S%G5631><s%>, plucked up by the roots <S%G1610><s%> <S%G5685><s%>;

Raging <S%G66><s%> waves <S%G2949><s%> of the sea <S%G2281><s%>, foaming out <S%G1890><s%> <S%G5723><s%> their own <S%G1438><s%> shame <S%G152><s%>; wandering <S%G4107><s%> stars <S%G792><s%>, to whom <S%G3739><s%> is reserved <S%G5083><s%> <S%G5769><s%> the blackness <S%G2217><s%> of darkness <S%G4655><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%>.
